title: Kayn full VGU and story update already in the works

replies.body: looks more like ez hit the gym and got a lovely gift from taric
I'd show you the kind of lovely gifts Ezreal gets from Taric, but that isn't allowed on the boards.
I'll bet it's a pearl necklace!  Ez loves pearls.
Not as much as he loves a good set of family jewels and a royal sceptre.

Well yeah. 

I feel like a some people who got the reference might not have understood that I specifically picked a pic from 4 instead of 2 because Kayn is _currently_ Siegried from 2.
Huh...you know I never drew the connection of Soul Edge to Shushu from Wakfu until now.
This kinda looks likenit could be a J4 skin
I was thinking a very masculine-faced irelia lol
